title: Report Damaged Electric Meter Box
description: A customer reports that the electric meter box on the side of their house is damaged.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's account and address.
Explain that while the meter itself belongs to the utility, the meter box (enclosure) is typically the homeowner's responsibility to repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the ownership and responsibility policy.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to hire a qualified electrician to make the repairs and provide instructions for scheduling a temporary disconnection for safety during the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful advice and creates a disconnect/reconnect service order.
